title: Data-Driven Intelligent Design and Simulation Workshop for Preserving Traditional Textile Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Applies data-driven design methodologies to enable pre-service teachers to creatively develop traditional culture education materials.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and reproduce the geometric composition of traditional textile patterns based on mathematical principles.
Learners can produce digital textile design prototypes using color mapping and texture simulation technologies.
Learners can apply color optimization algorithms through Octree quantization and k-means clustering to educational content development.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
